clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma From Guangdong
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Cohort Study of Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma to Establish Prognostic Models, to Discover Toxicity Associated Predictors and to Validate Randomized Trials in Clinical Practice

brief_summary.textblock: This prospective cohort study aims to establish prognostic models, to discover toxicity associated predictors and to validate randomized trials in clinical practice.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related acute adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0

study_pop.textblock: This study includes patients with nasopharyngeal carcinoma in all stages.
